name: semiquaver
text: You euthanized your Nice Pete faster than any Achewood resident on record.  Congratulations.

name: saint
text:
I'm actually beating Asherdan in lame-to-chubby ratio on this little arc right here!

oh balls oh balls.

name: dusty
text: That's no emo cut, emo cuts are just enough to show up in a picture for your blog. That's a blood gushing, skin flap making, stone cold psychopath cut.

name: connormc
text:
chubby for making me shudder with "skin flap making"

eughhh god damnit

name: lexsenthur
text: This isn't some animes crap, if your scar doesn't have marks from the stitches you gave yourself with piano wire, it isn't a scar worth showing off.

name: johnnyrocker
text: Nice Pete is not part of any modern popular culture trend. Nice Pete is a psychopathic southern man who murders people and hallucinates about imaginary pies.

name: homeskool
text: I fail to see the connection between the south and West Virginia, but maybe I'm not looking hard enough.

name: rowboat
text: One more concrete argument against homeschooling.

name: catjumpjohn
text:
As a music nerd, I figured out that the rhythm above Nice Pete's second sentence, whether intentional or not, makes him creepier.

"Aaa, aand I, have, cut my bo, dy."

text: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH AAAAAAAAH AH AH AH AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH

text: MASTER OF KARATE

text: "and I am the winner", motion dismissed

text: Here I see 19 people who don't watch TV and 10 who feel that the flickering maiden's virtue must be defended on the tubes.

We've seen his downstairs mixup.

He's Nice Peeeeeeeeeeete

name: zefiel
text: Yeah, you'd think Ray would go easy on the Goth angle if it's allowing Little Nephew to hang out with TWO semi-hot chicks, at night, in the middle of the forest. There could've been some Sceptre Hyddying, if you catch my drift.

name: juancarlos

name: epicurus
text: Harsh... but fair.

name: mangaknightz
text: i was actually pretty sure the tall one was a guy. i didn't really give the shorter one much thought as either.

name: sredni
text: Yeah i totally picked that tall goth as a hella ugly dude.

name: overmedicated
text: Aww shit... Freud would have a feckin' field day with my brain.

name: rowboat
text: You totally said that you would do that dude. How come?

name: heccibiggs
text:
Man, overmedicated is CONSTANTLY talking about how much he wants to bone dudes. Like all the time.

Seriously, dogg, the evidence keeps piling up.

(Also, I too pegged the tall one as a guy.)

name: achilleselbow
text: I think you might want to rethink your use of the word "pegged" in this case.

name: darthemed
text: Looks like you riled up some goths. Ohhhhh shiiiiit.

name: st-elmos_fire
text: The tall one could go either way, the short one probably female as I don't think I have seen a goth male with light coloured hair, well this is untrue but it is quite the uncommon thing. Also I believe it is supposed to be wearing a corset, and as much as androgyny is appreciated that is one place that is not gone.

name: woodenteeth
text: Why aren't there any MEDIUM goths?

name: drskradley
text:
I argue that dudes should not be Goths, as they look awful. Chicks often look awesome and/or hella sexay, but dudes rarely if ever do.

Also, further problem with being Goth: no summer wear. We've all seen it tried (read: faded black Black Metal or industrial or gothic metal shirt, crappy cargo shorts), and it always looks forrible.

name: cosmonaut
text:
But... if you're wearing a black/goth metal shirt you're a metalhead, and if you're wearing an Industrial shirt you're a rivethead.

Damnit, goths deserve to be mocked, but do it RIGHT man!

name: drskradley
text:
I agree, but the majority of the goths I've known engage in some genre-blending in there. I don't think I've ever seen a full-blown rivethead in the flesh, beyond just a half-goth with chunky boots. When I'm talking rivethead, I'm talking goggles on the forehead that are never worn over the eyes, dusty military trenchcoats, nuts and bolts on your fingers for rings, copper body piercings et al.

Wait, that's some archetype for a steampunk anime character. Okay I don't really know what I'm talking about, apparently. Also, the sleep medicine's kicked in, so I'll blame that.

name: rowboat
text:
Putting the semantics aside, it can be reasonably assumed that they should all be slapped around just for being the way they are.

This statement flies in the face of every idea I have regarding personal freedom, but I just can't help but really mean it with all my heart.

name: belgand
text: I think part of the problem is that with the ladies there is basically only sexy and chubby, but think they're being sexy even though they're really just sad, lonely, and kind of creepy everyone else out. There is basically no in-between.

name: cousinted
text: Are we sure those two are girls? It's hard to tell with Goths.

name: cousinted
text: Why didn't I bother to read the next two comments before posting this? It would have saved me a lot of heartache and about a minutes worth of typing.

name: rowboat
text: That's about six words a minute, Ted. I am solidly of the "hunt and peck" school of typing and even I scoff at that.

name: iloveyoucupcake
text: This strip is really the reason I've never skipped reading Achewood every day. Lovely. Just lovely.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: halloween costume idea.

name: epicurus
text: At the time I first saw this I read it with the girl I was dating and every time one of us saw the other in a bathrobe it was understood that the person in the robe would pose like this and sing Pete's lines.

name: deancain29
text: that is awesome. I plan to to this very thing tonight (on my own, to my cat)

name: evolume
text: before achewood, you must have had nothing to say in any situation, ever.

name: epicurus
text: My roster of bathrobe songs is more well rounded now, that's for sure.

name: blarghamagarky
text: do you want to go out sometime

name: darkwaffle
text: I showed this brilliance to a friend of mine. It did not please him. And I was disappointed.

name: mangaknightz
text: oh isnt that just the worst? it makes you feel pretty alone to enjoy something and not get to share that enjoyment with people. not that alone is necessarily bad, of course.

name: relaxing
text:
It is bad to not be able to share your enjoyment.
It is good that we can come here and talk about this.

name: rowboat
text: I'm always taken aback by friends - people who I love and respect - not being instantly thrilled by Achewood. I understand that it takes time to really fall for it completely, but it's just so.... fucked up not to have your mind blown by Onstad's work. I must start trying harder.

name: salvar
text: And on top of that, I wanted to impress them with it, so I showed them all the Nice Pete ones, because they are the funniest. Now all my friends think I'm a serial killer.

name: zapatos
text:
I usually show off this strip:
http://achewood.com/index.php?date=04092003

name: aelindil
text:
This is a problem that I share.

At my bridal shower, someone gave me a cutting board, and I made a joke about someday wanting to invent a cutting board that does not hold DNA evidence.

The silence was thick as meaty stew.

name: deancain29
text: So...fuuuucccckkkked up. and I love it

name: jodequa
text: i laughed so hard i fell down and cried the first time i read this

name: centipede_damascus
text: This strip is hell of disturbing, yo.

name: paco
text: their expressions in panel 7! Is being so perfect! Do not know whether is best to look away or watch!

name: zeroasalimit
text: Pete makes every part with him shine. I mean, he takes my attention away from Ray!

name: hendetta
text: HE IS THE DEATH SOUND AND HE HAS CUT HIS BODY AND IT WAS IN FRONT OF YOU.

name: pwb
text: nice pete is so excellent

name: tomsonlocal
text: Damn goths, they don't even use question marks!

name: envika
text: Who.

name: rowboat
text: The tall dude who overmedicated totally wants to bone.

name: tttt
text: I guess Pete is forgiven for kidnapping Philippe

name: rhymesforkids
text: the last three panels are impossibly funny.

name: molesticide
text: woulda been a 4, but the strip right after this one makes it a 5.

name: evolume
text: i haven't seen a thin goth in years.

name: sp1derbaby
text:
The rise of obesity and diabetes has increased the fat and sugar levels of human blood to unhealthy levels.

That or World of Warcraft.

name: cthulhu235
text: Count on Nice Pete to seperate the goths from the boys...

name: deusoma
text: I find it amusing that Nice Pete's willing to dance naked and mutilate himself in front of strangers, but he's still trying to hide his shame behind his legs.

name: joeyramoney
text: i think that the mangina option says much more about the mental instability of the individual. a penis is just what you'd expect to see between his legs, but no, he did something a lot more interesting.

name: jar
text: I always imagine Nice Pete to be singing this song in a creepy falsetto.

name: rachel
text: chubbied holy shit

name: envika
text: I always imagined him singing it with the cookie monster vocals, but that works too.

name: ted0phile
text:
Oh man.

I AM DEATH SOUND.
I CUT BODY.
ARARARARAR HOMPF HOMPF
MMMM.

name: hyetal
text: I do not lol often, sir, but I am pleased to report that this made me lol.

name: theguitarhero
text: It's too sing-song for cookie monster vocals.

name: tekende
text:
Wow, that is a crazy idea. Go to a dungeon.
I imagine it as a flat, deep monotone...like Peter Murphy but with no emotion whatsoever.

name: rowboat
text: Then you mean just like Peter Murphy. Dude's a statue. With pigeon shit on his shoulders.

name: ricnine
text: Whoa now I can't stop hearing this line in my head in Peter Murphy's voice.

name: tekende
text: My work here is done.

name: spinynorman
text: Yep, I always did with a falsetto, too.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: so have i.

name: steerpike66
text: I can't help but think of some horrible basement industrial music and a groaning plaintive Bowie-ish voice.

name: dans
text: Oh my god. My constant linking to this strip has made many people question my sanity.

name: shemmjacc
text: if I ever have a band I'm naming it Nice Pete & The Death Sound regardless of what it sounds like

name: dagobert
text: There actually is an industrial band called The Death Sound that named themselves after this strip.  They got started round back in September of last year.  www.myspace.com/thedeathsound

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: Ken the Jeopardy Champion!
Roast Beef: 32 Pastas
Pat: What is it with people who offer free samples at the store.
Teodor: 'Mad World"
Philippe: New Ink Jet Printer!
Lyle: crap
Onstad: More Risotto.

name: le_baron_noir
text:
If Teodor's going to go through the trouble of bashing himself in the nuts with a hammer, I'd think he'd at least try to be as ambitious as a Prince cover. I mean, if you're goin' that far, you may as well go all the way.

Maybe it's just me.

name: direhaggis
text: Is Nice Pete cutting himself with a garden trowel?

name: woodenteeth
text: i had exactly the same thought... can you imagine him getting the call from Ray and just sitting there staring into space for a little while as it slowly dawned on him that he would go out into the yard and start sharpening that trowel... eeeshhhh.

name: direhaggis
text: The calm glean in his eyes as he whips out a whetting stone and starts softly, carefully, out-of-his-mindedly works the thing just to cut his flesh.

name: professorhazard
text: It's the knife that Jerry Espenson tried to kill Shirley Schmidt with.

name: fineoakstructure
text: This should be obvious to all.

name: gtc
text: Heh heh, I was the 666th person to rate this strip.

name: theirateturk
text: If only this happened to every goth during their younger and more formative years :(

name: envika
text: are you new here? i've been liking some of your comments lately

name: nonemorenegative
text:
In honour of me getting my signed, framed Death Sound strip in the post...

[IMGS OFF]

name: lechatbotte
text: Silence of the lambs set to Bauhaus in a fucked up 2000 strip. HELL YEAH! That's a well aged diss 30 years in the making! (Now who's the poser?)

name: possums
text: AND I HAVE CUT MY BODY

name: hendetta
text: I always imagine it as being sung like that song kids use to use to tease each other, "nah-nah-nah-nah boo-boo."

name: dasilodavi
text: Man, this strip is like all kind of disgusting.

name: freerhi
text: impressed by np's use of 'tuck-back'.

name: johnnymalo
text: Panel six aaaaaah...perfection.

name: mal3
text:
I just see this as portraying what lengths Ray will go to to make sure Little Nephew stays on the straight and narrow.

And by straight and narrow, I mean hip.

And by hip, I mean what Ray thinks.
